Description: The Interview Scheduling Panel application streamlines the process of scheduling and managing interviews.
It provides a user-friendly interface for interviewers and candidates.
Improves coordination and reduces manual effort.
Duties: Analyzed business and functional requirements to design efficient workflows for interview scheduling and management.
Designed and developed responsive, user-friendly application interfaces to support interviewers and candidates.
Implemented application features using a component-based architecture and followed best coding practices.
Collaborated closely with UX designers to align system functionality with user experience requirements.
Coordinated with backend teams to integrate application services and ensure accurate data exchange.
Ensured application consistency, performance, and usability across multiple browsers and devices.
Conducted unit testing, identified defects, and resolved issues to maintain application stability.
Used version control systems to manage source code, track changes, and support team collaboration.
Participated in requirement discussions, issue analysis, and solution implementation to support continuous improvement.

Description: Developed to monitor projects handled within the organization.
Tracks progress and evaluates the health status of each project.
Improves visibility and reduces manual monitoring effort.
Duties: Analyzed project requirements and participated in sprint planning and refinement activities as part of an Agile development process.
Designed and developed responsive and interactive user interfaces to visualize project health, progress, and key metrics.
Implemented application features using a modular and reusable component-based approach and also worked with Chart.js.
Actively worked in sprint-wise development, delivering assigned user stories within defined timelines.
Used Jira to track tasks, user stories, bugs, and sprint progress, ensuring timely updates and clear communication with stakeholders.
Collaborated closely with UX designers to align application functionality with usability and design standards.
Coordinated with backend teams to integrate services and ensure accurate and secure data flow between systems.
Ensured application consistency, performance, and compatibility across multiple browsers and devices.
Performed unit testing, debugging, and issue resolution to maintain application stability and quality.
Utilized Git for version control, including branching, merging, and code reviews, to support collaborative development and maintain code integrity.
Participated in sprint reviews and retrospectives to identify improvements and enhance development efficiency.

Description: Developed to support the Ministry of Health in managing and maintaining accurate land and property registration records.
Enables authorized users to register, update, verify, and track land-related information in a structured and secure manner.
Improves data accuracy, transparency, and operational efficiency by replacing manual processes with a centralized system.
Supports compliance with government regulations and provides reliable access to land registration data for administrative and decision-making purposes.
Duties: Participated in the design and development of a land-based registration system to support accurate record management and regulatory compliance.
Analyzed business and functional requirements provided by stakeholders and converted them into system features.
Developed user-friendly interfaces to capture, view, and manage land registration data efficiently.
Collaborated closely with backend teams, QA, and business analysts to ensure seamless data flow and system integration.
Implemented validations and workflows to improve data accuracy and reduce manual errors.
Ensured application performance, usability, and consistency across different devices and browsers.
Supported testing activities, identified defects, and fixed issues to ensure stable releases.
Maintained proper documentation and followed development best practices throughout the project lifecycle.

Description: Northridge is a US-based medical and pharmaceutical application designed to streamline healthcare and pharmacy operations.
Manages patient records, prescriptions, medicine inventory, and pharmacy workflows efficiently.
Follows Agile methodology with sprint-wise development and uses Bitbucket for version control.
Duties: Developed frontend components using React.js and TypeScript, ensuring responsive and user-friendly UI.
Implemented backend services using Java, integrating APIs for data retrieval, processing, and database operations.
Participated in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and sprint reviews to deliver incremental project milestones.
Collaborated with the US-based client to gather requirements, provide updates, and incorporate feedback.
Managed version control and code collaboration using Bitbucket.
Conducted unit testing and debugging to ensure application quality and reliability.

Project.Description: Developed a mobile-first, responsive web application using React (TypeScript), HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to present business information, services, and products in a clear and engaging manner. The application enables easy navigation across sections, ensures cross-device compatibility, and delivers a modern, professional online presence with improved usability and accessibility.
